ARABIC: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when his Lord called out to him in the holy valley of Tuwa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When his Lord called to him in Tuwa's holy vale?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When his Lord called him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: when his Lord called him in the holy valley of Tuwa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When his Lord called him in the holy valley of Tuwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When his Lord called him in the holy valley of Tuwa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When his Lord called upon him in the holy valley, twice,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When his Lord called to him in the holy valley, Towa:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: How his Lord called him in the holy vale of Tuwa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: His Lord called out to him by the sacred valley of Tuwa:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Recall what time his Lord called Unto him in the holy vale of Tuwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when his Lord called out to him in the holy valley of Tuwa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, thy Lord did call to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa:-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When his Lord called him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: His Lord called to him in the Sacred Valley of Towa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When His Lord called out to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:16] when his Lord called out to him in the holy valley of Tuwā? — this is the name of the valley (it may be read with nunation, Tuwan, or without) — and He said:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (How his Lord called him in the holy vale of Tuwa) the name of the valley; it was called so because it was traversed by so many prophets; it is also said: tread (Ta'), Moses, with your feet on this valley because of its goodness and grace.
